name: Delta Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the delta frequency

languages.description: Ein Signalfeuer, das auf der Delta-Frequenz sendet.
languages.name: Delta-Signalfeuer

languages.description: Balise de localisation émettant sur la fréquence Delta

languages.description: Localizzatore che trasmette sulla frequenza Delta
languages.name: Localizzatore Delta

languages.description: 델타 주파수를 보내고 있는 위치 신호기 입니다.
languages.name: 델타 비컨

languages.description: Baliza de localización emitiendo en frecuencia delta
languages.name: Baliza Delta

languages.description: 持续发送出 Delta 频率的信标定位装置。

languages.description: 周波数デルタで発信するロケータービーコン
languages.name: デルタビーコン

languages.description: Transceptor Localizador Delta transmitindo na frequência Delta

languages.name: บีคอนเดลตา

languages.description: Konum bulucu delta frekansında yayın yapıyor
languages.name: Delta Beacon

languages.description: Радіомаяк, що транслює на частоті Дельта.
languages.name: Радіомаяк «Дельта»
